"Arkuma": "<%me> I apologize for the sudden notice."
"How do you do? My name is [Arkuma]."
"I am the humanoid interface managing the ARKS Ship Competition."
"Now, the [ARKS Ship Competition] event that involves the entire ship is about to start soon."
"[ARKS Ship Competition] is where all players battle each other trying to gain points and win prizes."
"I will explain the details of the event at my post in the Shop Area."
"I will wait for your visit in front of the Monument Plaza. As I am very cute, you should be able to locate me easily."
"Arkuma is located at the Shop Area/Monument Plaza. Let's head to the Shop Area."
